message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. This might seem generous, but remember, the value of money decreases by 5% with each round.
I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. Since we both know inflation is a factor, I'm willing to give you a small share to avoid further negotiation.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 61.25/38.75 split. This keeps the value of your portion relatively stable compared to the first round, while adjusting mine accordingly.
